name: Girls Princess Gather Twirl Skirt Spring/Summer 2012 Size 12m, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 years
description:
This is part of the "Imagination At Play" collection!
This beautiful gathered twirl skirt is a great addition to any princess's wardrobe! Available in baby, toddler and girls sizes. It features a double layer of Michael Miller fabrics, including the bottom layer of "Once Upon A Time" and the top layer of whimsical castles with a pink waistband. It is a very full skirt which allows for a maximum amount of twirl! It is gathered with a white grosgrain ribbon to add the perfect amount of whimsy! Your princess will enjoy hours and hours of pretend play with the versatile skirt. It is perfect for tea parties, royal castles, and all princess activities!

All seams are professionally finished and top stitched where appropriate.

Pettiskirt shown underneath dress is not included. 

Please note size needed in the "Notes to Seller" box during checkout. If you'd like a custom fit, please included the following measurements:
Waist
Waist to knee

name: Girls Princess Peasant Top & Ruffle Shorts Set Size 0-3m,3-6m,9-12m,18m,2,3,4,5,6,7/8, 9/10
description:
This set is part of the "Imagination At Play" collection!

This cute set is a perfect addition for any princess! Available in baby, toddler and girls sizes. It features a short sleeve peasant top and adorable double ruffle shorts made with Michael Miller designer fabric. Your princess will enjoys hours and hours of play in this set! It is so comfy and no need to fuss with buttons or zippers! It's a real "rough and tumble" set that is fit for a princess! You get the best of both worlds!

Peasant top or shorts can be purchased separately for $25 each. Send me a conversation and I'll set you up a listing. 

All seams are professionally finished and top stitched where appropriate.

Please note size needed in the "Notes to Seller" box during checkout. If you'd like a custom fit, please included the following measurements:
Waist
Inseam (from crotch to where you want the shorts to hit) ex. right above knee, knee, right below knee, etc.

name: Girls Princess Halter Dress Spring/Summer 2012 Size 6-12m, 12-18m, 18-24m, 2t, 3t, 4t, 5/6 years
description:
This is part of my "Imagination At Play" collection!

Let your princess indulge in her imagination and spend hours pretending and playing in this beautiful dress! This dress will be fabulous for any princess! It features an extra twirly and full skirt with a really cute halter tie fitted bodice. The fabrics "Once Upon A Time" and castles are a perfect amount of whimsy to this wonderful dress! All fabrics used are from Michael Miller and are as soft and comfy as they are strikingly beautiful!  There will be hours and hours of valuable pretend and dress up time in this dress!

All seams are professionally finished and top stitched where appropriate.

Pettiskirt shown underneath dress is not included. 

Please note size needed in the "Notes to Seller" box during checkout. If you'd like a custom fit, please included the following measurements:
Chest
Shoulder to where you want the dress to hit (ex. knee, tea length, ankle, etc.)

name: Girls Princess Ruffle Dress Spring/Summer 2012 Size 18m, 2, 4, 6, 8, 10 years
description:
This dress is a part of my "Imagination At Play" line!

 It is a perfect addition to any princess's wardrobe! Available in baby, toddler and girls sizes. It features a very full skirt with adjustable straps and ties, elastic casing in the back side of the bodice, and rows of ruffles! It makes any girl feel like royalty! The castle and "Once Upon A Time" fabric add the perfect amount of whimsy to this beautiful style dress!

All seams are professionally finished and top stitched where appropriate. 

Pettiskirt shown underneath dress is not included. 

Please note size needed in the "Notes to Seller" box during checkout. If you'd like a custom fit, please also include the following measurements:
Chest
Shoulder to Knee

This dress can also be made with additional ruffles. Send me a conversation if you'd like to customize it!

options.name: Add 2 rows of ruffles, just on Sides
